{"id":934904794,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"4 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1681675806,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/934904794/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"44 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number} n\n * @return {boolean}\n */\nvar isHappy = function(n) {\n    let slow = sumOfSquares(n)\n    let fast = sumOfSquares(sumOfSquares(n))\n    while (true) {\n        if (fast === 1) return true\n        if (slow === fast) return false\n        slow = sumOfSquares(slow)\n        fast = sumOfSquares(sumOfSquares(fast))\n    }\n}\n\nfunction sumOfSquares(n) {\n    let [last, rest] = [n % 10, Math.floor(n / 10)]\n    if (rest === 0) return last ** 2 \n    return last ** 2 + sumOfSquares(rest)\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
